data.name: Genius AI Platform
data.description: üî• An all round web, SaaS application where user can sign-up and use provided tools to generate images, videos, Code snippets and chat with AI. Build Using TypeScript, Next 13, tailwind for design. React-toast for Error handling, Open AI API for GPT Turbo AI Injection.

data.name: NFT Marketplace
data.description: üì¶ Full StackNFT Marketplace on Ethereum blockchain where usercan list, buy, sellNFTs. Solidity Programming Language for writing the Smart Contract. Used react.js & next.js for the front-end development. We connected the back-end to Ethereum blockchain.

data.name: Cyber-Fiction
data.description: üåÄ This unique and engaging scrolling animation (Front-end) project is created using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and added extra animation feature using canvas. Used Locomotive scroll and GSAP for Scrolling animation.

data.name: 2048 Game
data.description: ‚öôÔ∏è 2048 is a JavScript based puzzle game where you have to multiply two same numbers and get 2048 in the board .

data.name: Weather App
data.description: üöÄ  This is a single-page weather forecast application designed to provide users with current weather details and a 5-day forecast for any city around the world. It utilizes a public API to fetch real-time weather data and presents it in a user-friendly and intuitive interface.

data.name: Sherry-animation
data.description: üöÄ Smooth Liquid click Animation to transition between different components.
